name: byit-real-estate-platform
description: Byit Real Estate Commission Management Platform - A comprehensive system for managing real estate brokers, commissions, and property development in Egypt

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.next
scripts.type-check: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate

author: WGhaly
